scripts.build: lightningcss --minify --bundle --sourcemap --targets "> 0.5%, last 2 versions, Firefox ESR, not dead" src/index.css -o index.min.css && yarn run move-files
scripts.move-files: mkdir dist & ((mv index.min.css dist || move index.min.css dist) && (mv index.min.css.map dist || move index.min.css.map dist))
